main event: A witness observed an unidentified flying object, described as a luminous circular disc, in Nitro, West Virginia.
interesting points: The object was observed for several minutes and estimated to be about the size of a basketball., The object was reported to move from northwest to west., The witness originally thought the sighting could be imagination until an Air Force staff car passed by the next morning., The object gave off a glowing light and possibly a blinking light., The report contained various questionnaires and sketches regarding the sighting.
sighted object: one luminous circular disc in the sky
witness description: A male observer who provided a detailed description in a questionnaire.
